datestamp

{% raw %}

datestamp[source]

datestamp(dt:datetime=datetime.datetime(2021, 7, 5, 6, 2, 26, 903996))

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
datestamp()

1621814400
{% endraw %}

convert datetime string to timestamp

{% raw %}

stringToTimestamp[source]

stringToTimestamp(stringTime:str, formatString:str, timeZone:timezone=datetime.timezone.utc)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
stringToTimestamp("04-02-90", "%d-%m-%y")

634089600.0
{% endraw %}
